full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@001B NA MO GU RU BHYA: DAG PA GNYIS LDAN KUN MKHYEN YE SHES CHU, ,BRAN PAS 'CHI BDAG GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I 'DAB, ,RAB BZHAD PADMA RIGS GTZO TSE MTHA' YAS, ,'KHOR DANG BCAS PA DGE LEGS BYE BA STZOL,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RGYAL KHANG CHEN RTZEB HUR TSA PI LIG THU AER TE NI MIR GEN MKHAN PO CHOS RJE BKA' CHEN BLO BZANG SHES RAB, BKA' CHEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, GNYER BA DRUNG RAM PA BSTAN 'DZIN TSUL KHRIMS, YE SHES TSUL KHRIMS, YE SHES CHOS 'PHEL, BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS 'BYOR BCAS NAS 'DUS PA RGYA MTSO'I TSOGS 'DON DU BCUG CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SHR'I,, ,,)
